  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BossRenderer
    Displays boss information including name, sprite, health bar, and stage.
    GameView
    The main in-game layout containing the Tetris grid, side panel, and boss info.
    LoseView
    Game-over view displayed when the Tetris board overflows.
    MainMenuView
    The main menu view with Start, Settings, and Exit buttons.
    SceneManager
    Manages view switching within a single Scene.
    SettingsOverlay
    Semi-transparent pause overlay displayed when ESC is pressed.
    SidePanel
    Displays Hold piece and Next piece previews.
    TetrisRenderer
    Draws the 10x20 Tetris grid on a Canvas.
    WinView
    Victory view displayed when all 10 bosses are defeated.
